![Visitors make their way up the Great Hall stairs](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/278a88bb42289e60035c3ff18fb03b92a13cf174-5120x5120.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

# Plan Your Visit

## Closures

The Met Fifth Avenue coat check is currently closed while we prepare for a state-of-the-art coat check opening Fall 2025.

[See a list of currently closed galleries](https://www.metmuseum.org/visit/gallery-closures).

## Locations and Hours

### The Met Fifth Avenue

![The Met Fifth facade](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/7c82dc04b9b7cd6fdc7050baac63f9a0fa1d0b58-3200x1800.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

### The Met Cloisters

![alt](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/362dd4f65145fe84efebf96ba66de7d5db6f8b7f-4096x2326.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

## Tickets

#### Suggested Admission

New York State residents and New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut students: the amount you pay for admission is up to you, but you must pay something ($00.01 minimum per ticket).

#### General Admission

##### Booking online

Once inside, proceed to any gallery entrance and present your ticket.

##### Included with your ticket

All admission tickets include exhibitions and same-day entry to both Met locations.

##### Member benefits

Members and Patrons enjoy free and unlimited entry. Scan your Membership card at any gallery entrance for admission. Need help? Visit the Membership desk in the Great Hall.

##### Group Visits

All groups of 10 or more, and third-party guided tours of any size, are required to register in advance. Register [here](https://www.metmuseum.org/visit/group-visits).

## Know Before You Go

Review our visitor guidelines to get the most out of your Met experience.

Plan your route to the Museum.

Use The Met's interactive map to get around the Museum.

We welcome all visitors and affirm our commitment to offering programs and services that are accessible to everyone.

Where to eat and drink when you visit.

Enjoy free admission, complimentary guest tickets, invitations to exclusive viewing hours, discounts, and more.

## Now on view

![Bright gallery with white pedestals showcasing a variety of stone statues and objects in glass cases.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/8085b5b608bffc5be90cd079c676c53790c91762-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Tall ancestor poles arranged in a curve in the center of a bright white gallery space.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/bd19c9299e817c2ffff4e6c01e21cf4e8684a302-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

![Portrait of a black man in a suit, amongst clouds. ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/dcca052ba521ef094bd0d68e70253c385493af40-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Square Text box with a gray background. White bold text is in the top left corner that read The Roof Garden Commission following by pink text that reads Jennie C Jones](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/543014d9fb2f02d5c116118d161e3de2e67df74c-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

![Man holding a living Rooster, again a red backdrop](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/dc917f2d2991984a1ba767407192a6709ad53751-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

![Abstract swirl of red and blue lines with a vortex-like center. Waves suggest fluid motion, evoking a dynamic, mesmerizing effect.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/2a892afbfea0cbbcb64225b7c63e915cb926df2e-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

![alt](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/8a74fa97cc00d08a3ea26a042bab5bc6dfb4e2a8-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

![alt](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/cc7db4562568666d922df90241ecb24c726eb1e4-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![red and blue foliage background colorful portrait of a black woman wearing a green bandana](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/eb835a48b4ccc4587344f0703a2972142761d95b-5121x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)
![Ornate silver shield with intricate gold vine patterns and medieval animal motifs, accented by brass rivets on a blue background.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/f899defe4207ddc1156694b63af1181963b7dfc2-5120x2880.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

## More Ways to Explore

![ ](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/d5b3fd10d2a5e48062d52ae48b77de7ca92f58b0-5472x3648.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

Explore the Museum as a family with special guides, events, and more.

![visitors wearing headphones listening to the Audio Guide.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/ec5de82ab502b9a101d6b3424559b2230cbeade7-3840x2160.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

Stream Audio Guide content for thousands of artworks in the galleries and for select current exhibitions.

![A set of four iPhones with screens showing different aspects of The Met Fifth Avenue digital guide on the Bloomberg Connects app.](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/cctd4ker/production/1b60b5c103645b15dee719b1b17577a5f3d4e0dc-3840x2160.jpg?w=3840&q=75&fit=clip&auto=format)

Enhance your visit at The Met Fifth Avenue using our digital guide, available for free in the app store.
